DataElement.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-G.I.NET21 Past Week Have Side Effects From Treatment Score Checkbox Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not an individual has or had treatment in the past week, using a single character text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-G.I.NET21 Past Week Have Side Effects From Treatment Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The aims of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) are to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London._A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual has or had side effects from their treatment._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire - Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumors 21
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The aims of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) are to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London.:A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments.

Concepts.longName: European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer
Concepts.definition: A group with aims to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London.

Concepts.longName: Quality of Life Questionnaire - Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumors 21
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about whether an individual has or had side effects from their treatment.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator determining determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
